description: The Department of National Defense (DND) has a temporary help services requirement under a Supply Arrangement (EN578-172870). OD(D=DOS Reliability. Invitation is to EN-065 participants only.
full_summary:
***

### Tender Announcement for One (1) Special Advisor

#### Tender Title and Details

* **Tender Title (English)**: NPP – S4851024 - THS SA – One (1) Special Advisor. Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR).
* **Tender Title (French)**: APM – S4851024 - AMA SAT – Un (1) Conseiller Spécial. Les services d'aide temporaire dans le cadre de l’arrangement en matière d'approvisionnement pour la région de la capitale nationale (RCN).

#### Tender Reference and Status

* **Reference Number**: cb-890-77591115
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: S4851024
* **Publication Date**: 2024-03-13
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: 2024-03-19T15:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-03-19
* **Tender Status (English)**: Expired
* **Tender Status (French)**: Expiré

#### Required Services and Security Clearance

* **Temporary Help Services Requirement**: The Department of National Defense (DND) requires temporary help services for the National Capital Region (NCR).
* **Security Clearance**: Level of security required is DOS Reliability, which recommends a Targeted Business Solution Service (TBSS) compliant clearance.

#### Eligible Contractors and Selection Criteria

* **Eligible Contractors**: Contractors who have been invited to submit a proposal are:
	+ 8513929 Canada Inc.
	+ ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
	+ Altis Recruitment & Technology Inc.
	+ Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
	+ DLS Technology Corporation
	+ IBISKA Telecom Inc.
	+ Leverage Technology Resources Inc.
	+ MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
	+ MGIS Inc. & iGeoSpy Inc. in JV
	+ NewLeaf Performance Inc.
	+ Olav Consulting Corp
	+ Portage Personnel Inc.
	+ Promaxis Systems Inc
	+ TDV Global inc.
	+ Turtle Island Staffing Inc.

#### Contact Information and Related Documents

* **Contact Information**: For more information, please contact CFSG(O-G) Temp Help at CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca or (613)
